headline: Anyone interested in doing a mock coding interview in VR?
description:
If anyone has an Oculus Quest 2 and is interested in getting interviewed in VR lmk! I run a youtube channel that creates coding interview related content and I'm looking for more people interested in getting interviewed on camera: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfotE5RL1pfhIZ0fv2kAN9Q

You can remain completely anonymous, and I promise to give you detailed feedback after the call is done. All I ask is that we are allowed to record for the youtube channel.
headline_zh-Hans: 有谁有兴趣在VR中进行模拟编码面试？
headline_zh-Hant: 有誰有興趣在VR中進行模擬編碼面試？
description_zh-Hans:
如果有人有Oculus Quest 2，并且对接受VR采访感兴趣，请联系我！我将会为您解答。 我经营着一个创建编码采访相关内容的youtube频道，我正在寻找更多有兴趣接受镜头采访的人：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfotE5RL1pfhIZ0fv2kAN9Q

你可以保持完全匿名，我保证在通话结束后给你详细的反馈。我所要求的是，允许我们为youtube频道录音。
description_zh-Hant:
如果有人有Oculus Quest 2，並且對接受VR採訪感興趣，請聯繫我！我將會為您解答。 我經營著一個創建編碼採訪相關內容的youtube頻道，我正在尋找更多有興趣接受鏡頭採訪的人：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfotE5RL1pfhIZ0fv2kAN9Q

你可以保持完全匿名，我保證在通話結束後給你詳細的反饋。我所要求的是，允許我們為youtube頻道錄音。
